The results are still showing the same strange Samsung Community results with dates in the future. Here are my final query candidates:

The search results are consistently returning irrelevant information, primarily from the Samsung Community and with incorrect dates. It seems the search tool is not functioning as expected. I cannot reliably find a relevant news article about Samsung Electronics with the current tool.
